nodes.bodyText:
Good point! I think that it is possible in case when the user deletes the profile on filesystem right before downloading copybooks.
We need another Error type and Error message for this case. I'll add them.

Ha! I can't reproduce it.
When I choose the profile, then delete the file and try to download copybook via "quick fix", the IDE asks me to choose the other profile.
When I delete all profiles, IDE shows an error "Zowe profile is missing".
This case already covered.
Nice, it looks simpler than a hierarchy of classes. Like, subscribe.
